Reviews.Title: The pockets fit genuine Cokin filters which are 1/8" longer and 1mm more narrow
Reviews.Author: Ali Julia

} var node = cv_mo1QDWE55WE5A2Rpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo1QDWE55WE5A2RcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1QDWE55WE5A2RcurrentClick) { return cv_mo1QDWE55WE5A2RcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:35 MinsI am a big fan of Cokin filters. My Cokin filters come in plastic cases and most of them do not close tightly any more not and they take up a lot of room in my camera bag.The nylon case provides better protection and takes up less room than the plastic cases. I have migrated all my filters into this folio. Genuine Cokin filters are 1/8" longer than Camkix filters (for which this folio has been designed) and 1mm more narrow. However, the pockets of this folio are just large enough to accept Cokin filters with no room to spare. Camkix filters slide it a bit easier because they have a bit more room.Alternatively, you can slide in the filters with narrow side in and then have 1/4 of the filter poking out of the pocket. When the folio is closed the filters do not rub against each other, so they will not scratch each other. I prefer the horizontal position because a snug fit keeps the filters inside the pockets better.The case is 18.5" x 8.75" when opened, and 5.5" x 8.75" when closed. Each pocket is 4.25" x 3", and fits both the slightly larger Cokin filters and CamKix filters in both horizontal and vertical position.The package includes two microfiber cleaning cloth. The black microfiber cleaning cloth is 6.125" x 7". I find this large size cloth to be convenient to hold and it did a fine job cleaning. The white cleaning cloth is 3.125" x 5.25". I found that 3.125" side is too narrow to be convenient, due to the narrow width I caught myself touching the filter with my hand.I received this filter case from the manufacturer for testing and review.Ali Julia review

Reviews.Title: Prompt and Exact
Reviews.Author: YAlvarez
Reviews.Content: The items came promptly and exactly as described, great quality too. Exactly what I needed and at the right price. Short, simple, sweet.

Reviews.Title: Filter Wallets
Reviews.Author: KenS
Reviews.Content: I have for many years used the folding wallets for my filters. Not only does it keep them in good order, I can also separate the filters in the groups for my personal use. These wallets would have gotten a 5 star rating had it not been for the pocket size of the filter; by that I mean the pockets were to small for me to place the filter in the plastic pocket in their case. Other wallets that I have accomidate pockets that are oversized with filters in their case and that's the way I like to store them. Please make the plastic pockets larger to fit the hard case they come in. Great price.Thank youKenS

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: A. Lee
Reviews.Content: Great pouch to hold both square and round filters.  Has velcro closure strips to secure the tri-fold pouch.  Nice, and two for the price of one, you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Filter wallet
Reviews.Author: Frank A
Reviews.Content: This is a great product for the price.  It included 2 wallets that can store filters up to 82mm.The construction and materials of these wallets is top quality. Stores nicely in my camera bag.
